casebody.data:
CITY OF CHARLOTTE
v.
HURLAHE, et al. No. 387P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2006. Rebecca Cheney, John P. Barringer, Charlotte, for City of Charlotte. Averill C. Harkey, Charlotte, for William H. Hogue. Robert H. Hull, Jr., Charlotte, M. Jay Devaney, Eric Biesecker, Greensboro, for Trustee-Deed of Trust.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of August 2006 by Defendants (John and Linda Hurlahe) to Withdraw Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of October 2006."
